alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LAKE MOULTRIE... ...MARINERS SHOULD SEEK SAFE HARBOR... At 538 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Holly Hill to 8 nm northeast of Ridgeville to Jedburg, and moving east at 30 knots. HAZARD...strong winds 35 to 45 knots. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect briefly stronger winds and suddenly higher waves. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Moultrie should seek safe harbor immediately. If caught on the open water, stay as low as possible and wear a personal flotation device. Remember, if you can hear thunder you are at risk for being struck by lightning.
